info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 2 weeks ago,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Nice, peaceful abode in otherwise loud and chaotic dhaka. It was good to not hear perpetual honking for a few days.
Hotel restaurant has great food.
Breakfast was tasty and had good variety/
I enjoyed my stay.
Last but not lease, the staff was very courteous and friendly.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Very nice hotel for the price, excellent location in Dhaka, very safe area, great staff, very friendly and helpful. The buffet breakfast is very good.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: A comfortable stay at a hotel in a great location. Water is nice and hot.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The location is amazing and close to necessaries places, team are welcoming and helpful. The room is super calm, I fully recommend

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2021,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Very clean and spacious! Staffs are very friendly.
Location and price wise best value. Definitely will recommend my friends and will come back.
